functions.name: manage_product_operations
functions.description: Unified function for managing product operations: get product details, update products, or delete products. This is the recommended function to use for all product management tasks.

action.description: The operation to perform: 'get_product' to view details, 'update_product' to modify fields, 'delete_product' to remove the product

product_id.description: The ID of the product to operate on (required for all actions)

title.description: New product title (for update_product action only)

description.description: New product description (for update_product action only)

price.description: New product price (for update_product action only)

productCollectionID.description: New collection ID for the product (for update_product action only)

media.description: New media array for the product (for update_product action only)

tags.description: New tags array for the product (for update_product action only)

canBeAffiliated.description: Whether the product can be affiliated (for update_product action only)

commission.description: Affiliate commission percentage (for update_product action only)

functions.name: get_product_by_id
functions.description: Get detailed information about a specific product by its ID. Returns complete product data including title, description, pricing, media, and all other product details.

product_id.description: The ID of the product to retrieve

functions.name: update_product
functions.description: Update specific fields of an existing product. Only the fields provided in update_data will be modified.

product_id.description: The ID of the product to update

update_data.description: Object containing the fields to update. Can include: title, description, price, productCollectionID, media, tags, canBeAffiliated, commission

functions.name: delete_product
functions.description: Delete a product from the store. This action is irreversible - always confirm with the user before executing.

product_id.description: The ID of the product to delete
